explanation: [0-0] A shirtless man stands in a room with his legs apart and arms raised, his body covered in small, round objects. On the wall opposite him is a large screen displaying a standing human skeleton model, also with its arms raised.

[0-2] The shirtless man begins by bending his knees, leaning forward slightly, squatting down, and then jumping up with his arms raised high, leaping to the right. At the same time, the human skeleton model on the opposite screen performs the same movements as the man. The camera then moves to the right, the shirtless man lands on his feet, and a man in a blue shirt is squatting opposite him. The shirtless man then gets up and runs to the left, seeing the human skeleton model on the opposite screen performing the same movements as him.

[0-2] The shirtless man begins by bending his knees, leaning forward slightly, squatting down, and then jumping up with his arms raised high, leaping to the right. At the same time, the human skeleton model on the opposite screen performs the same movements as the man. The camera then moves to the right, the shirtless man lands on his feet, and a man in a blue shirt is squatting opposite him. The shirtless man then gets up and runs to the left, seeing the human skeleton model on the opposite screen performing the same movements as him.

[2-4] The scene then switches to another part of the room, where the shirtless man is standing facing forward with his arms raised straight ahead. A man in gray clothes and a man in blue clothes are standing behind him. The shirtless man then stretches his arms and leaps vertically to the right. The camera follows the shirtless man as he moves to the right and lands on his feet. There is a bar counter behind him, with a woman standing inside and a man in a red short-sleeved shirt sitting on the floor outside the bar counter, holding a mobile phone in his hand. They all look to where the man landed.

[2-4] The scene then switches to another part of the room, where the shirtless man is standing facing forward with his arms raised straight ahead. A man in gray clothes and a man in blue clothes are standing behind him. The shirtless man then stretches his arms and leaps vertically to the right. The camera follows the shirtless man as he moves to the right and lands on his feet. There is a bar counter behind him, with a woman standing inside and a man in a red short-sleeved shirt sitting on the floor outside the bar counter, holding a mobile phone in his hand. They all look to where the man landed.

[4-14] The shirtless man stands up on his feet, but leans back due to unstable center of gravity. He quickly turns to the left, spreads his legs, and stands firm. Then the scene switches to another location in the room, the shirtless man stands sideways, then leaps to the right and lands steadily again. When the shirtless man gets up, he leans back and takes a step back. A man in blue clothes lies in front of the shirtless man and reaches out his right hand to press the shirtless man's left foot. However, the shirtless man steps back, raises the tip of his left foot, and the man in blue clothes misses. Then the picture switches to the human skeleton model, which raises its arms, then lowers them, then jumps to the right front, and then lands steadily.
